Author: Martin
Body: Love LuxFares for being so supportive.
Heading: Love LuxFares for being so supportive.

Author: Jess Bronson
Body: good and awesome hotel to stay in for vacation .Near to ocean drive and good location .I recommend
Heading: good and awesome hotel to stay in for…

Author: Mr Travis Eagleson
Body: could not make changes to flight, not even for a booking fee.
Heading: NOPE

Author: Brennan Bush
Body: I tried reaching customer service 5 separate days. I asked for a call back. I left a voicemail. I emailed and still nothing. Will never use again
Heading: I tried reaching customer service 5…

Author: Martina Moga
Body: I booked my flight ticket to Paris from LuxFares.com, it was very quick and user-friendly flight booking website.
Heading: Quick and User-friendly

Author: Neil Gleason
Body: Booked a trip and received confirmation email.  When the e-tickets did not arrive promptly, sent an email to ask if everything was OK,  in the meantime, multiple checks of the LuxFare website listed my booking as “confirmed”. More than a day later, received an email reply to the effect: So sorry, your booking was never confirmed and will not be ticketed.  A live chat session yielded an admission that there had been a technical glitch, but still tough luck for me.  Due to the elapsed time, my cost for 2 tickets rose more than $300.  Use LuxFares at your peril.
Heading: Lured me in and then left me without tickets.

Author: Kerrie
Body: I was so glad to have the experience and knowledge when I called about my reservation. The man that helped me was so kind and patient. Thanks for the great job. I will surely use this company for my travel needs from now one.
Heading: Great experience

Author: Ammy Wilson
Body: Recently I have travelled to Dallas and I have done my flight booking through LuxFares and I loved the service provided by them.
Heading: Excellent  service support
